results.name: Land of Zympaia The New Light

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD FX(tm)-8300 or Intel Core i5 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard-Sound
  • Additional Notes: Minimum image resolutions 1176x664, 16:9
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5, Intel Core i7 series, equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti, equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Onboard-Sound
  • Additional Notes: Recommended image resolutions 1920x1080, 16:9

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
